name: Lynn
description:
Arrow keys to move ,  E to interact  , R to restart from checkpoint (KEYBOARD)

This atmospheric puzzle-platformer game explores the story of Lynn and her attempt to find ways to fix her aging robot caregiver, AX. Lynn breaks into a factory and find parts to repair him. She will have to sneak her way into a dangerous facility, hack into other robots and find her way within this factory before AX stops functioning permanently.

Will she be able to save her only companion in time before it’s too late?
